participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Friendly and optimistic, enjoys sharing experiences and connecting with others.
participant_1.background: I'm not sure if I'm close with my family. I have a small beagle dog who I call Droopy. My pets love to swim in the lake in my backyard. I have a close relationship with my mother. I received a full scholarship to Florida State University.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful and creative, values solitude and enjoys writing as a form of expression.
participant_2.background: I don't know what my weight is, but I'm trying to get healthier. I am a writer, and I use my solitude to my creative advantage. I still have a thick accent so words like hippopotamus are difficult. Our kids are 14 and 12 years old. I love to read romance novels.

content.text: Hey there! How are you doing?
Hello! I'm doing alright. How are you?
Doing great! I am a writer as well. What kind of stories do you like to write?
I like to write romance novels. Do you have any pets?
I have a beagle named Droopy. He loves to swim in the lake in my backyard.
That sounds adorable! I have two kids, 14 and 12, and they love to swim too.
Do you have any fun hobbies?
I love to read, but I'm trying to get healthier so I've been walking more.
That's awesome! I'm going to start working out more too.
It's hard to find the motivation sometimes, but it's worth it!
Agreed! I'm just glad it's getting warmer so I can go outside and do it.
Me too! I love the sun. Do you have any plans for this weekend?
I'm not sure yet. Maybe I'll go swimming with Droopy. What about you?
I'm not sure yet either. Maybe I'll go to the park with my kids.
